name: Chad E
text: Papa bless! Always good. Many orders have been made here and they've all been great. Exactly what we wanted and easily accessible since it's in mini mall.

text: I have been ordering pizza from here for a couple of years and never had a single problem. Then again, I don't expect to have any problems ordering pizza.  What makes me want to write a positive review is the outstanding customer service I ‚Ä¶More

text: Great pizzas. Nice clerk. Fast service.

name: Julie Mulhatten
text: Daughter wanted pan pizza.....this was a disaster.   Burnt edges the whole way around both pizzas.  Bottom crust like cardboard, not crispy whatsoever. It looked and tasted awful.  $50 down the drain.

name: Jill B.
text: We like their subs. Pizzas are just okay.

text: Wonderful.. Best pizza I've ever had.... Manager was great helping me get the best deal for what I wanted....

text: Very friendly staff at this location, and quick-to-service.

name: James Leiner
text: For Florida pizza papa johns isn't horrible...but about average..sauce is mild..needs more spice..cheese is ehhhh.and crust just doesn't seem to Brown enough..but in a pinch of a pizza need.. Its okay

text: The store is very clean, open and inviting. The staff are very friendly too! Always great specials and excellent food!
